mapper.insert: insert into db_orderlable_transform (ID, ORDERID, FLAG, PICNUM, DOWNLOADTIME, PICTIME, EXPRESSTYPE, PDFURL, PARAMDATA, ERROR) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{picnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{downloadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pictime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdfurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{paramdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{error,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_orderlable_transform set ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PICNUM = #{picnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DOWNLOADTIME = #{downloadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PICTIME = #{pictime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPRESSTYPE = #{expresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDFURL = #{pdfurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PARAMDATA = #{paramdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ERROR = #{error,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, ORDERID, FLAG, PICNUM, DOWNLOADTIME, PICTIME, EXPRESSTYPE, PDFURL, PARAMDATA, ERROR from db_orderlable_transform where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, ORDERID, FLAG, PICNUM, DOWNLOADTIME, PICTIME, EXPRESSTYPE, PDFURL, PARAMDATA, ERROR from db_orderlable_transform
